page.title: 04OCCUPATIONS CONT.
page.content: Of the people who live in Walpole many in some way or other are involved in FARMING(see page 5).Other main places of work are METAL BOX,FRANK IDEANS, ANGLIA COMPONENTS,SMEDLEYS,BARON MEATS and BALDING and MANSELLS all of WISBECH.In the villages there are two garages employing a few mechanics, Kitchen specialists called HELENA KITCHENS,and NENE FRUIT AND VEGETABLES FACTORY who employ a number of people mainly women.A number of people living in the village are employed in service idustries both in and outside the village e.g.Shop Keeping,Banking,Teaching,Local government and Lorry driving.With un employment nationally at over 12% it is not surprising to find a similar percentage out of work in Walpole.
